original_text: And one shall burn the heifer in his sight; her skin, and her flesh, and her blood, with her dung, shall he burn:
korean_text: 그 암소를 자기 목전에서 불사르게 하되 그 가죽과 고기와 피와 똥을 불사르게 하고

sentences.original_text: And one shall burn the heifer in his sight
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람은 그의 눈앞에서 암송아지를 불사를 것이요

sentences.original_text: her skin, and her flesh, and her blood
with her dung, shall he burn:
